byline.contributor: Chris Buckley and Didi Kirsten Tatlow contributed reporting from Beijing.
byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and JANE PERLEZ

abstract: Clash between United States and China over rolling stairs used for Pres Obama to descend from Air Force One results in Obama instead using built-in stairs in belly of plane after arrival for Group of 20 summit; miscommunication creates impression that China wanted to deprive Obama of grand entrance.
lead_paragraph: China’s handling of the president’s arrival has created a narrative that the Chinese snubbed him. The reality, American officials say, is both simpler and more complicated.
snippet: China’s handling of the president’s arrival has created a narrative that the Chinese snubbed him. The reality, American officials say, is both simpler and more complicated....

headline.main: Obama Plays Down Confrontation With China Over His Plane’s Stairs
headline.print_headline: Obama Lands in China: How a Clash Over Stairs Created the Impression of a Snub
